name: Intel Core i9-13900K
description: The Intel Core i9-13900K is the most powerful desktop processor we’ve reviewed yet, as it blasted its way to the top of all of our benchmark tests, for both content creation and gaming.

name: AMD Ryzen 5 7600X
description: The Ryzen 5 7600X shines at gaming performance. In testing, it beat off a pair of formidable Intel Alder Lake processors, including the flagship i9-12900K. This is all thanks to the high frequency speeds, hitting a peak of 5.3GHz without overclocking.

name: AMD Ryzen 9 7900X
description: AMD claims the Ryzen 9 7900X has a max boost clock speed of 5.6GHz. The only part that seemingly hasn’t been upgraded is the amount of cores and threads from the previous gen – there’s still 12 cores and 24 threads
